global.error-occurred: An error has occurred. Please, try again later.
global.name: Name
global.slogan: Online client-side manager for secure storage and secrets sharing.
global.doc-reference: GuardedBox documentation is available at https://guardedbox.eu
global.legal-notice: The legal notice can be found at https://guardedbox.eu/policy.html
global.copyright: Copyright (C) 2020 Dino Security S.L. All rights reserved.

session.no-session-info: You cannot load data or make any changes.
session.body-session-expired: Would you like to keep working without a session? If you choose ✓ you will be able to continue working but you will not be able to load data or make any changes. If you choose ✕ you will be redirected to the login page.
session.title-working-without-session: You are working without a session.
session.body-working-without-session: You cannot load data or make any changes.

login.popover-get-code: If your credentials are correct, you will receive an email with your login code soon (within the next 1-10 minutes). Otherwise, check your email and password and try again.
login.popover-login-failed: Any of the three credentials components (email, password or access code) is incorrect. Please, verify all them and try again.
login.privacy-modal-p1: To use GuardedBox you need to know and agree with our Service Terms and Conditions, as well as know our commitment with privacy. In summary, what we do with your personal data is the following:
login.privacy-modal-row3-col2: Register, log-in and manage your GuardedBox account.
login.privacy-modal-row4-col1: How long do we keep your data?
login.privacy-modal-row4-col2: As long as you use GuardedBox.
login.privacy-modal-row5-col1: Who do we share your data with?
login.privacy-modal-row6-col1: Where can I exercise my rights?
login.privacy-modal-row6-col2: You can exercise your access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, portability and objection rights writing an email to dpo(@)guardedbox.es
login.privacy-modal-p2: Nevertheless, you can read further details of our privacy notice and service terms and conditions at https://guardedbox.eu/policy.html
login.privacy-modal-p3: Do you agree with our privacy notice and service terms and conditions?
login.register-success-modal-body: You will receive an email with the instructions to complete the GuardedBox registration process. You can now close this page.
login.register-mail-just-sent: There is a pending registration or invitation for {email} that was submitted recently. You need to wait a few minutes before resending it.

registration.info-password: Please, choose a very strong password. It must have at least {passwordMinlength} characters and {passwordMinStrength}% strength, although 100% is recommended. Try to use a passphrase only you can remember, rather than a simple password. Your password will be used to encrypt your secrets. If you forget this password, you will not have access to your secrets!. IMPORTANT: The current GuardedBox version doesn't support changing the password.
registration.registration-completed: Your account has been successfully created.
registration.registration-token-not-found: Sorry, the registration link is not valid. Please, start over the registration process.
registration.registration-token-invalid: Sorry, the registration link is not valid. Please, start over the registration process.
registration.registration-token-expired: Sorry, the registration link has expired. Please, start over the registration process.
registration.password-insufficient-length: Your password must have at least {passwordMinLength} characters.

accounts.check-keys-info: We recommend you to ask {email} to get into the "{view}" section of GuardedBox and to tell you his public encryption key so you can check that it matches this one.
accounts.email-already-registered: The email {email} is already registered in GuardedBox.
accounts.email-not-registered: The email {email} is not registered in GuardedBox.
accounts.email-not-registered-invite: The email {email} is not registered in GuardedBox. Would you like to send an invitation?
accounts.confirm-resend-invitation: Do you want to send an invitation again to {email}?
accounts.invitation-success-modal-body: An email was sent to {email} with the instructions to complete the GuardedBox registration process.

my-account.title: My account
my-account.delete-account-modal-body: Your account "{email}" will be permanently deleted from GuardedBox. All your secrets, shared secrets and groups will be deleted as well. This operation is irreversible! Are you sure?
my-account.incorrect-introduced-mail: The email you typed is not your email.
my-account.title-account-deleted: Your account has been deleted from GuardedBox.

secrets.not-shared: This secret is not shared with anyone
secrets.key-value-pair-info: A secret may have several properties. For example, if the secret is a credit card, it may have 3 properties: Card number, CVV and Expiration date.
secrets.generate-random-value-disabled: As a protection, you must delete the current value to generate a random one

my-secrets.title: My secrets
my-secrets.no-secrets: Your box of secrets is empty!
my-secrets.delete-secret-modal-body: The secret "{secret}" will be deleted. Are you sure?

shared-secrets.remove-receiver: Are you sure you want to stop sharing the secret "{secret}" with "{email}"?
shared-secrets.remove-pending-registration-receiver: Are you sure you want to remove "{email}" from the registration pending emails to share the secret "{secret}"?
shared-secrets.remove-ex-member: Are you sure you want to forget secret "{secret}" was shared with "{email}"?
shared-secrets.secret-unshared-by-owner: You removed this user from this secret
shared-secrets.do-not-self-share: You cannot share secrets with yourself.
shared-secrets.secret-already-shared-with-email: This secret is already shared with {email}.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-email: The secret is not shared with {email}.
shared-secrets.secret-not-shared-with-you: The secret is not shared with you.

secrets-shared-with-me.title: Secrets shared with me
secrets-shared-with-me.no-secrets: There are no secrets shared with you.
secrets-shared-with-me.reject-shared-secret-modal-body: Are you sure you want to reject the shared secret "{secret}"?

groups.no-participants: This group does not have any participant
groups.remove-participant: Are you sure that you want to remove "{email}" from the "{group}" group?
groups.remove-pending-registration-participant: Are you sure you want to remove "{email}" from the registration pending emails to add to the group "{group}"?
groups.remove-ex-member: Are you sure you want to forget "{email}" was in the group "{group}"?
groups.participant-removed-by-owner: You removed this user from this group
groups.delete-secret: Are you sure that you want to delete the "{secret}" secret from the "{group}" group?
groups.do-not-self-invite: You cannot invite yourself to one of your groups.
groups.email-already-participant-in-group: {email} is already a member of this group.
groups.you-are-not-participant-in-group: You are not a participant of this group.
groups.you-cannot-view-group-participants: You cannot view the participants of this group.

my-groups.title: My Groups
my-groups.no-groups: You have not created any group.
my-groups.delete-group-modal-body: The group "{group}" will be deleted along with all its secrets. Are you sure?

groups-i-was-added-to.title: Groups I was added to
groups-i-was-added-to.no-groups: You have not been added to any group.
groups-i-was-added-to.exit-group-modal-body: Are you sure you want to leave the group "{group}"?
